channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WY

item.title: Report E-2024030206
item.description:
Report E-2024030206

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: CHEYENNE
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Approximately 3 gallons of Lamba-Cyhalothrin 1 EC, which released from 1 gallon plastic jugs that are packed into cardboard boxes on a pallet, likely due to other dunnage crushing the containers. No d=/drains, Soils or waterways were impacted.
